The textured walls, each uniquely designed with varying degrees of difficulty, presented both a physical and mental challenge that I had missed during my hiatus. Each climb was not just a test of strength but also a moment of reconnecting with the community, sharing tips, and exchanging stories with others who shared my passion for climbing.
